titles.title: Jury Duty Exemption for Breastfeeding Act of 2023
Jury Duty Exemption for Breastfeeding Act of 2023
To exempt breastfeeding women from jury duty, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
